languages.text: Дом Орселлио, не посмевший пойти против Вольного Торговца, недолго выяснял, кто станет новым Новатором. Вскоре череда кровавых убийств обрушилась на них — по слухам, загадочные ксеносы в пестрых одеяниях несли им смерть и вырезали Атласы из груди убитых. Дом Орселлио пал быстро, кроваво и загадочно. Леди Кассия не вмешалась в сию расправу.

House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.
languages.original_text: Дом Орселлио, не посмевший пойти против Вольного Торговца, недолго выяснял, кто станет новым Новатором. Вскоре череда кровавых убийств обрушилась на них — по слухам, загадочные ксеносы в пестрых одеяниях несли им смерть и вырезали Атласы из груди убитых. Дом Орселлио пал быстро, кроваво и загадочно. Леди Кассия не вмешалась в сию расправу.

traits.locale_text: House Orsellio did not dare to oppose the Rogue Trader. Its struggle to determine a new Novator was not long. Soon, a series of bloody assassinations struck it. Some said that mysterious xenos in motley garb were bringing death to them, carving Atlases from the chests of the murdered. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not interfere.

House Orsellio did not dare to oppose the Rogue Trader. Its struggle to determine a new Novator was not long. Soon, a series of bloody assassinations struck it. Some said that mysterious xenos in motley garb were bringing death to them, carving Atlases from the chests of the murdered. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not interfere.

House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, carving the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not interfere.

The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not interfere.

Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

languages.text: 奥赛罗家族没有勇气反对行商浪人，而新任的大族长的斗争也没有持续太久，因为整个家族很快沦为了一系列血腥暗杀的牺牲品。有些人说，行凶者是神秘的异形。它们穿着五颜六色的服饰，残忍地屠戮受害者，从他们的胸口中挖出了圣仪。奥赛罗家族在神秘的屠杀之中迅速陨落，而卡西娅女士也并没有对这场屠杀加以干涉。
languages.original_text: House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

traits.locale_text: 奥塞罗家族没有勇气反对行商浪人，而新任的大族长的斗争也没有持续太久，因为整个家族很快沦为了一系列血腥暗杀的牺牲品。有些人说，行凶者是神秘的异形。它们穿着五颜六色的服饰，残忍地屠戮受害者，从他们的胸口中挖出了圣仪。奥塞罗家族在神秘的屠杀之中迅速陨落，而卡西娅女士也并没有加以干涉。

languages.text: Das Haus Orsellio wagte es nicht, sich gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu stellen, und der Kampf um die Ernennung eines neuen Novators dauerte nicht lange. Bald gab es eine Reihe blutiger Attentate innerhalb des Hauses. Manche sagten, die Täter seien mysteriöse Xenos in bunter Kleidung gewesen, die ihre Opfer brutal abmetzelten und ihnen die Atlanten aus der Brust schnitten. Der Fall des Hauses Orsellio war schnell, blutig und mysteriös. Lady Cassia schritt nicht ein, um das Massaker zu beenden.
languages.original_text: House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

traits.locale_text: Das Haus Orsellio wagte es nicht, sich gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu stellen, und der Kampf um die Ernennung eines neuen Novators dauerte nicht lange. Bald gab es eine Reihe blutiger Attentate innerhalb des Hauses. Manche sagten, die Täter seien mysteriöse Xenos in bunter Kleidung gewesen, die ihre Opfer brutal abmetzelten und ihnen die Atlanten aus der Brust schnitten. Der Fall des Hauses Orsellio war schnell, blutig und mysteriös. Lady Cassia mischte sich nicht ein.

languages.text: La maison Orsellio n'osa pas s'opposer {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et sa recherche d'un nouveau Novator fut de courte durée. Elle fit bientôt l'objet d'une série d'assassinats sanglants. Certains affirment que les auteurs de ces meurtres brutaux étaient des xénos vêtus de tenues bigarrées qui arrachaient l'Atlas de la poitrine de leurs victimes. Le déclin de la maison Orsellio fut rapide, sanglant et nimbé de mystère. Dame Cassia ne fit rien pour empêcher le massacre.
languages.original_text: House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

traits.locale_text: La maison Orsellio n'osa pas s'opposer {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} et sa recherche d'un nouveau Novator fut de courte durée. Elle fit bientôt l'objet d'une série d'assassinats sanglants. Certains affirment que les auteurs de ces meurtres brutaux étaient des xénos vêtus de tenues bigarrées et qu'ils arrachaient l’Atlas de la poitrine de leurs victimes. Le déclin de la maison Orsellio fut rapide, sanglant et nimbé de mystère. Dame Cassia ne s'en mêla aucunement.

languages.text: La casa Orsellio no osó oponerse a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y su lucha por determinar un nuevo Novator fue breve, aunque no tardó en ser víctima de una serie de cruentos asesinatos. Algunos dicen que los culpables eran xenos misteriosos de vestimentas moteadas que mutilaban brutalmente a sus víctimas, arrancándoles los Atlas del pecho. La caída de la casa Orsellio fue rápida, sangrienta y misteriosa. Lady Cassia no interfirió para evitar la masacre.
languages.original_text: House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

traits.locale_text: La casa Orsellio no osó oponerse a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y su lucha por determinar un nuevo Novator fue breve, aunque no tardó en ser víctima de una serie de cruentos asesinatos. Algunos dicen que los culpables eran xenos misteriosos de vestimentas moteadas que mutilaban brutalmente a sus víctimas, arrancándoles los Atlas del pecho. La caída de la casa Orsellio fue rápida, sangrienta y misteriosa. Lady Cassia no interfirió.

languages.text: オーセリオ家は自由開拓者とあえて反目しようとはせず、またノベイターの後継者争いも長くは続かなかった。ほどなくして、家人が次々と凄惨な暗殺劇に巻き込まれていったのだ。犯人はまだらの衣をまとう謎の異種族で、惨殺された犠牲者の胸からアトラスをえぐり取ったという証言もある。オーセリオ家は瞬く間に、不可解な血染めの転落劇を演じた。レディ・カシアがその虐殺を止めるために介入することはなかった。
languages.original_text: House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

traits.locale_text: オーセリオ家は自由開拓者とあえて反目しようとはせず、またノベイターの後継者争いも長くは続かなかった。ほどなくして、家人が次々と凄惨な暗殺劇に巻き込まれていったのだ。犯人はまだらの衣をまとう謎の異種族で、惨殺された犠牲者の胸からアトラスをえぐり取ったという証言もある。オーセリオ家は瞬く間に、不可解な血染めの転落劇を演じた。レディ・カシアがその虐殺を止めるために介入することはなかった。

languages.text: Orsellio Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e karşı çıkmaya cesaret edemeyince yeni Rota Reisi'nin belirleme mücadelesi çabucak sona erdi. Hane, kısa süre sonra bir dizi kanlı suikastın kurbanı oldu. Faillerin, kurbanlarını vahşice katleden ve Atlaslarını göğüslerinden oyup çıkaran, renkli kıyafetler kuşanmış, gizemli zenolar olduğunu söyleyenler oldu. Orsellio Hanesi'nin çöküşü hızlı, kanlı ve gizem içinde vuku buldu. Leydi Cassia, katliamı durduracak herhangi bir müdahalede bulunmadı.
languages.original_text: House Orsellio did not dare oppose the Rogue Trader, and its struggle to determine a new Novator did not last long. It soon fell victim to a series of bloody assassinations. Some said the perpetrators were mysterious xenos in motley garb who brutally slaughtered their victims, gouging the Atlases from their chests. The fall of House Orsellio was quick, bloody, and mysterious. Lady Cassia did not intervene to stop the massacre.

traits.locale_text: Orsellio Hanesi, Hür Tacir'e karşı durma cüretini göstermedi ve yeni bir Rota Reisi belirleme çabaları uzun sürmedi. Hane, çok geçmeden bir dizi kanlı suikasta kurban gitti. Bazıları kurbanlarını vahşice katleden ve göğüslerindeki Atlasları söken faillerin, rengârenk kıyafetler giyen gizemli zenolar olduğunu söylüyordu. Orsellio Hanesi'nin çöküşü hızlı, kanlı ve gizemliydi. Leydi Cassia, katliamı durdurmak için herhangi bir müdahalede bulunmadı.
